categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Fentis Brach was a male Pureblood Sith of the Sith Empire. During the Galactic War he was stationed on the Vaiken Spacedock.
Fentis Brach appears Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a Sith Inquisitor gear vendor on Imperial Fleet.
